Text:
Thanks blackcanary! Haven't liked Punisher since Ennis left but this is turning out to be a good limited series.

Blackcanary how do you become "Trusted" like you are?

You're welcome STFmaryville.  From the FAQ, "Don't ask--applications are not accepted and will reduce your chances. Just carry on uploading quality torrents and one day your skull will come."  Also ensure you have good descriptions for your torrents.
